title: Removal of the old Dev UI

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
### Description

Migrate the missing extensions and remove the old dev-ui

### Analysis
(links to analysis docs containing architecture design work, requirements gathering, etc)

<!-- task list will be automatically generated from below. 
     Just add issue references, i.e. #23, #458 and it will
     be picked up.
 >
<!-- EPIC:DATA
     
-->
